title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 05 October 2008 - XWiki
content: xwikibot - (05/10/2008 11:54): Drafts.SyntaxMigrationGuide was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/SyntaxMigrationGuide xwikibot - (05/10/2008 11:56): Drafts.SyntaxMigrationGuide was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol (Added warning for Luis ;)) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/SyntaxMigrationGuide xwikibot - (05/10/2008 11:58): Drafts.SyntaxMigrationGuide was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/SyntaxMigrationGuide xwikibot - (05/10/2008 11:58): Drafts.SyntaxMigrationGuide was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/SyntaxMigrationGuide xwikibot - (05/10/2008 11:59): Drafts.SyntaxMigrationGuide was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/SyntaxMigrationGuide xwikibot - (05/10/2008 12:00): Drafts.SyntaxMigrationGuide was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/SyntaxMigrationGuide vmassol - (05/10/2008 16:37): thomasmortagne: If you have a few minutes, I'd love to get your feedback on the mail I've just sent to the dev lists (that would allow me to finish the work over the week end) thomasmortagne - (05/10/2008 18:02): vmassol: reading vmassol - (05/10/2008 18:02): thomasmortagne: actually I sent another email just after for a vote vmassol - (05/10/2008 18:02): thanks thomasmortagne - (05/10/2008 18:07): vmassol: so your last mail means we don't need to forbid "=" in pages names, right ? vmassol - (05/10/2008 18:07): correct thomasmortagne - (05/10/2008 18:08): ok, "|" is already used as separator for pages at many places anyways so we can't more I guess vmassol - (05/10/2008 18:19): thomasmortagne: "can't more"? thomasmortagne - (05/10/2008 18:38): yes we need to forbid | in pages names thomasmortagne - (05/10/2008 18:38): vmassol vmassol - (05/10/2008 18:38): actually no vmassol - (05/10/2008 18:38): :) vmassol - (05/10/2008 18:38): thomasmortagne vmassol - (05/10/2008 18:38): we can allow escape in links vmassol - (05/10/2008 18:39): so for example: [[label|ref with ~| pipe||param=value]] thomasmortagne - (05/10/2008 18:39): we should have generic escapes possibilities in links, lists etc... vmassol - (05/10/2008 18:39): it's done in lists vmassol - (05/10/2008 18:39): the only place is links since links are opaque for wikimodel vmassol - (05/10/2008 18:39): only place where we have to specifically handle it in our code thomasmortagne - (05/10/2008 18:40): no we have rights for example vmassol - (05/10/2008 18:40): rights? thomasmortagne - (05/10/2008 18:40): in XWikiRights you have list of groups and list of users vmassol - (05/10/2008 18:40): oh I was only talking about rendering vmassol - (05/10/2008 18:41): (new rendering to be more precise) thomasmortagne - (05/10/2008 18:41): actually we can't even have " " or "," in pages names cause of that thomasmortagne - (05/10/2008 18:41): ok vmassol - (05/10/2008 18:41): my challenge right now is to have the rendering module not impose any restriction thomasmortagne - (05/10/2008 18:41): would be great yes thomasmortagne - (05/10/2008 18:42): I never like to have forbidden characters xwikibot -
